    stopMovement() - Method in class game.entities.Enemy
    Stops the movement timer so the enemy no longer moves.
    stopMovement() - Method in class game.entities.FlyingEnemy
    Stops both the superclass movement timer (if any) and this flyingTimer, so the flying enemy no longer moves horizontally or vertically.
    stopMovement() - Method in class game.entities.Obstacle
    Stops the vibration timer so the obstacle no longer moves.
